issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: use DFSUtil.getSpnegoKeytabKey() to get the spnego keytab key in secondary namenode and namenode http server

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.summary: the SPNEGO user for secondary namenode should use the web keytab

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: This is similar to HDFS-4105. in the NameNodeHttpServer.start() initSpnego should look for dfs.web.authentication.kerberos.keytab before using dfs.namenode.keytab.file.
fields.summary: namenode http server should use the web authentication keytab for spnego principal

comments.body: Patch that uses the correct config if available
